87A40651AF1A2C446EB6344B6020B7BE: A Common fish found in Grasslands, especially in stormy weather. Can be processed into Storm Core. A legendary Storm Flopper is rumored to live on the island.
B226322E4DEFE06F4DFDDC874688A87E: A Mythical Pickaxe formed from shards of the Storm King's horn. Hold attack to channel the power of the Storm and unleash a mighty boomerang throw that shatters any resource, or enemy, standing in your way.

Juno_UpdateItemData.12F3BD554A8CC1D9AD4622A1B768FB09: A Common fish found in Grasslands, especially in stormy weather. Can be processed into Storm Core.
Juno_UpdateItemData.EEFF0D174F98263648F101B6723ACCFF: A Legendary fish that can make a fine trophy.
Juno_UpdateItemData.2335D1BF4AAAEEB8E404788EBAF5870C: A crafting ingredient left behind by Storm Rollers.
Juno_UpdateItemData.B06E07284BF6527313840F999D350CEA: A fruit found in Storm ravaged areas. Eat to refill your Storm timer.
Juno_UpdateItemData.F0661A9D4D69B3933FD467900ECC6798: A highly concentrated source of Storm energy. When processed correctly, can reduce or deflect the effects of the Storm.
Juno_UpdateItemData.32A0B4254ECA1BD13F3505A867E7B267: A mighty, Mythical Sword formed from fragments of the Storm King’s horn. Hold attack to charge and release attacks of devastating Storm energy.
Juno_UpdateItemData.CA3CC1114E6977F0D0F7698863821FF9: A powerful dagger, ideal for melee combat. Deals critical hits when behind your target.
Juno_UpdateItemData.545FCA6647F2D70ED0A995A222E4CFBA: A shard of the Storm King's horn. Used to craft Epic weapons and tools.
Juno_UpdateItemData.1B719130460CCB9371C2B1A3F63C3171: An ominous, mystical orb of condensed Storm energy used to fuel the Tempest Gateway.
Juno_UpdateItemData.C53A5F42437F2D80CDE95C84B8359952: Blast your allies with a wave of healing Slurp.
Juno_UpdateItemData.81241C7842D6A8AB9548159457269FF7: Crystallized Rift energy. Used to craft the Legendary Forge and to strengthen tools and weapons to Legendary status.
Juno_UpdateItemData.CFEFB7ED417D200350A160BD04B7BC26: For how crunchy the juice is, it's surprisingly tasty.
Juno_UpdateItemData.A19F9AEE4CB6F5B299A1D196E33B48BA: Friendly animals will follow you for longer after feeding them this delicious treat.
Juno_UpdateItemData.71CCAEE1493B2C5ED0506190ACD63C81: Greatly increases hearts, armour, and the length of time on your Storm timer.  Reduces damage taken from Storm energy attacks.

Juno_UpdateItemData.345AB66B4DC3B350E849D0BFCE32DD1F: No one is safe from the Storm. Not even the fish!
